Articles.Content: Hi, so I got this problem. I've got a mission in which I must "Take an EVA report on the surface of Fabien's Region". The problem is a cannot enter the region ("You are entering Fabien's Region" message doesn't show up). I've done the mission about ten times already, even landed on the very precise spot where the marker is, collected the data, yet still nothing. Have you encountered this problem before? Or even better, do you know how to fix it?

Well, as far as I know, there are precisely two things that need to happen for that text to appear. Firstly, have you accepted the contract? I know that the markers show up in the Tracking Station before you even accept the contract, presumably to allow the player to judge if they can complete the contract.

Secondly, have you selected the marker and enabled the navigation feature to it?

Thanks for your reply! However I did both of those things and I still can't detect the region. I have already done many similar missions a and I had absolutely no problem, so I'm not entirely sure if this is some kind of bug or if I have done some mistake.

If you could, some screenshots of:

  1. The map view display of the target location (preferably with your craft landed nearby, if possible), and
  2. The full contract information display (i.e., the one in the Mission Control building)

would be useful.

And an output log might also be useful one way or the other.

So I started a new game and in some time I stumbled upon the same mission again (except this time I needed to land at Sector FKOW). I still canoot do the mission (the You are entering... message doesn't appear). Oh and here are some screenshots:

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0Bx3suLW4Lk5qc2U3MDkyd2pHSGs&usp=sharing
